abstract.p: New York Yankees manager Joe Torre says that he was 'surprised' by waiver acquisition of Jose Canseco, less than enthusiastic response that drew subtle rebuff from owner George Steinbrenner (S)

block.p: Joe Torre said Monday that he was ''surprised'' by the waiver acquisition of the slugger Jose Canseco, a less than enthusiastic response that drew a subtle rebuff from George Steinbrenner.

Yesterday, Steinbrenner put out this statement: ''I want it made very clear that I support the decision of Brian Cashman 100 percent, and I'm very surprised by anyone who would be surprised by his aggressiveness. Jose Canseco has been a very big contributor.''
Joe Torre said Monday that he was ''surprised'' by the waiver acquisition of the slugger Jose Canseco, a less than enthusiastic response that drew a subtle rebuff from George Steinbrenner.

Yesterday, Steinbrenner put out this statement: ''I want it made very clear that I support the decision of Brian Cashman 100 percent, and I'm very surprised by anyone who would be surprised by his aggressiveness. Jose Canseco has been a very big contributor.''

If Steinbrenner intended this to be a shot at Torre, the manager said after last night's game: ''I can't help it. He's the boss. I respect the fact that he's the boss. He can pretty much do whatever he wants.''
